comments:
If I preview the report,
org.eclipse.birt.report.model.metadata.ExtensionException will be found in
meta.log which is located in the root folder of RCP designer.
The exception stack is below:

This bug is due the enigne platform changes. This is fixed when engine fix the 
platform bug.
